metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15090 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in the DNSSEC validation component of PowerDNSRecursor from 4.0.0 and up to and including 4.0.6, where the signaturesmight have been accepted as valid even if the signed data was not inbailiwick of the DNSKEY used to sign it. This allows an attacker inposition of man-in-the-middle to alter the content of records by issuing avalid signature for the crafted records.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
